short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the number of unread Codeable notifications in the document title (Gmail style)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For Codeable experts, this extension will show the number of unread notifications in the page tab when signed into the Codeable app. It will also show the total comment and expert counts for each notification in the new projects popup widget. This extension will only work with the dashboard area of app.codeable.io and is not compatible with other sites or domains.
